issue.description: Give a title for the issue here

location.description: Indicates where the issue was found and its content (e.g., line 12 - image: nginx)

description.description: Provide a detailed description of the issue and its impact

standard.description: If applicable, provide the standard that is violated (e.g., CIS benchmark) or the Kubernetes documentation that is not being followed

link.description: If applicable, provide a link to the standard or documentation

recommendation.description: Provide a fixed version of the issue

score.description: From 0 to 100, gives an overall score of the Kubernetes YAML file

scoreCriteria.description: Calculated by deducting points based on the number of issues found on array 'issues', and their severity: -5 for Low, -10 for Medium, -20 for High, -30 for Critical issues. Score starts at 100. Additional penalties applied if best practices or security standards (e.g., CIS) are violated.
